body_html: @peterjc123 Sorry, I meant regarding how to install the package that I built from source. My experience with running python setup.py install is that sometimes it can make a mess that is hard to clean up, but I've never tried using pip to install a package that was locally compiled from source. The reason I compiled from source was so that I could include the MAGMA library.

body: @peterjc123 Sorry, I meant regarding how to install the package that I built from source. My experience with running `python setup.py install` is that sometimes it can make a mess that is hard to clean up, but I've never tried using `pip` to install a package that was locally compiled from source. The reason I compiled from source was so that I could include the MAGMA library.
